```{r load_packages, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE} 
library(tidyverse)
library(fontawesome)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
```

```{r eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
unchecked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("circle", fill = "#3e464a", height = "15px"))

checked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("check-circle", fill = "#89f0de", height = "25px"))

wk_post <- tibble(

"Description" = c("Read <i>Ethics in Social Research</i>",
                  "Partner up and decompose a manuscript",
                  "Continue CITI Training",
                  "Take a look at the EDP 612 research guide created by WVU libraries"),

"Details" = c("<a href='/readings/02-readings/#read-something'><span style='font-size: 25px; color: #89cff0;'><i class='fas fa-info-circle'></i></span></a>",
              "<a href='/tasks/02-tasks/#breaking-down-literature'><span style='font-size: 25px; color: #89cff0;'><i class='fas fa-info-circle'></i></span></a>",
             "<a href='/tasks/02-tasks/#continue-citi-ethics-training'><span style='font-size: 25px; color: #89cff0;'><i class='fas fa-info-circle'></i></span></a>",
             "<a href='/extras/02-extras/#research-guide'><span style='font-size: 25px; color: #89cff0;'><i class='fas fa-info-circle'></i></span></a>"),

Icon = c("", 
         "", 
         "citi",
         "external"),

Site = c("",
         "",
         "https://www.citiprogram.org/Shibboleth.sso/Login?target=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.citiprogram.org%2FSecure%2FWelcome.cfm%3finst%3d827&entityID=https%3A%2F%2Fidp.wvu.edu%2Fidp%2Fshibboleth",
         "https://libguides.wvu.edu/c.php?g=796440&p=5696432")

)
```

<center>
```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
wk_post %>%
  mutate(Icon = case_when(
    str_detect(`Icon`, "slack") ~ '<img src="/logos/slack-ico.png" alt="Slack icon" width="25">',
    str_detect(`Icon`, "ecampus") ~ '<img src="/logos/wvu-gold-ico.png" alt="Slack icon" width="25">',
    str_detect(`Icon`, "external") ~ '<div style="font-size: 0.5rem;"><i class="fa fa-external-link fa-2x" aria-hidden="true" style="color:#559977"></i></div>',
        str_detect(`Icon`, "citi") ~ '<img src="/logos/citi-ico.png" alt="Qualtrics icon" width="45">',
    TRUE ~ NA_character_
      )
    ) %>%
  mutate(Site = na_if(Site, "")) %>%
  mutate(Link = case_when(
    !is.na(Icon) ~ paste0("<a href=",Site," target='_blank'>",Icon,"</a>"),
    TRUE ~ NA_character_
      )
    ) %>%
  select(-Icon, -Site) %>% 
  mutate_all(replace_na,"") %>%
kbl("html",
    escape = FALSE,
    align = 'lcc') %>%
  kable_styling(full_width = FALSE)%>%
  column_spec(1, width = "20em", color = "#ffffff", extra_css = 'vertical-align: middle !important;') %>%
  column_spec(2:3, width = "5em", color = "#ffffff", extra_css = 'vertical-align: middle !important;') %>%
  row_spec(0, extra_css = 'vertical-align: middle !important;', color = "#f7f7f7")
```
</center>
